channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum LSF
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum LSF

item.title: CVE-2018-1724|2024-08-05T04:07:44.364Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20lsf
item.description: IBM Spectrum LSF 9.1.1 9.1.2, 9.1.3, and 10.1 could allow a local user to change their job user at job submission time due to improper file permission settings. IBM X-Force ID: 147439.
